mapper.sql: couponCode, couponName, couponType, price, couponDiscount, getType, description, publishNum, couponLimitNum, usedNum, receivedNum, effectiveDays, startDay
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from coupon
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon (couponCode, couponName, couponType, price, couponDiscount, getType, description, publishNum, couponLimitNum, usedNum, receivedNum, effectiveDays, startDay) values (#{couponcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{couponname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{coupontype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{coupondiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gettype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{publishnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponlimitnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usednum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receivednum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{effectivedays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into coupon
couponCode,
couponName,
couponType,
price,
couponDiscount,
getType,
description,
publishNum,
couponLimitNum,
usedNum,
receivedNum,
effectiveDays,
startDay,

mapper.update:
update coupon
couponCode = #{record.couponcode,jdbcType=CHAR},
couponName = #{record.couponname,jdbcType=CHAR},
couponType = #{record.coupontype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
couponDiscount = #{record.coupondiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
getType = #{record.gettype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=CHAR},
publishNum = #{record.publishnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
couponLimitNum = #{record.couponlimitnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usedNum = #{record.usednum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receivedNum = #{record.receivednum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
effectiveDays = #{record.effectivedays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
startDay = #{record.startday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update coupon set couponCode = #{record.couponcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, couponName = #{record.couponname,jdbcType=CHAR}, couponType = #{record.coupontype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, couponDiscount = #{record.coupondiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, getType = #{record.gettype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=CHAR}, publishNum = #{record.publishnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, couponLimitNum = #{record.couponlimitnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usedNum = #{record.usednum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receivedNum = #{record.receivednum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, effectiveDays = #{record.effectivedays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startDay = #{record.startday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update coupon
couponName = #{couponname,jdbcType=CHAR},
couponType = #{coupontype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
couponDiscount = #{coupondiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
getType = #{gettype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
description = #{description,jdbcType=CHAR},
publishNum = #{publishnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
couponLimitNum = #{couponlimitnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usedNum = #{usednum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receivedNum = #{receivednum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
effectiveDays = #{effectivedays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
startDay = #{startday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where couponCode = #{couponcode,jdbcType=CHAR}

update coupon set couponName = #{couponname,jdbcType=CHAR}, couponType = #{coupontype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, couponDiscount = #{coupondiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, getType = #{gettype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, description = #{description,jdbcType=CHAR}, publishNum = #{publishnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, couponLimitNum = #{couponlimitnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usedNum = #{usednum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receivedNum = #{receivednum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, effectiveDays = #{effectivedays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startDay = #{startday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where couponCode = #{couponcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
